Package org.core.adventureText

Interface AText

All Superinterfaces:
net.kyori.adventure.text.ComponentLike
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdventureText, LegacyText
@Deprecated(forRemoval=true) public interface AText extends net.kyori.adventure.text.ComponentLike
Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
Removed as component is now supported by all platforms (except spigot). Using Component
AText is a wrapper for all text on the server. If the server platform has AdventureComponent provided with it (such as Sponge or Paper) then AText will wrap over that, however if the platform doesn't have AdventureComponent then AText will wrap over a String using Legacy chat colours.

AText is immutable, therefore any modifications you do will be applied to the result of the method

    • withColour

      @NotNull @NotNull AText withColour​(@Nullable @Nullable TextColour colour)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Changes the colour of this text with the provided colour, this can be null to remove the colour. Removing the colour will set the colour to the default. If default and this has a parent with a colour then that colour will be displayed on this text
      Parameters:
      colour - The colour to change to
      Returns:
      The modified text
